[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 01 - Profit or loss but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. madecomgroupplc:AdjustedEBITDALoss All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
